ActCanadian Human Rights Act
PrecisAppointment of ATHANASIOS D. HADJIS of Ottawa, Ontario, to be Vice-Chairperson of the Canadian Human Rights Tribunal, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of seven years, effective July 18, 2022.
